titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit Kentucky to operate a separate retirement system for certain public employees.
A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit Kentucky to operate a separate retirement system for certain public employees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to permit Kentucky to operate a separate retirement system for certain public employees.
